mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESS_REQUEST VALUES( BUSINESS_REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{storeId}, #{userId}, #{requestApprovals}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT b.BUSINESS_REQUEST_ID, b.STORE_ID, b.BUSINESS_REQUEST_REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, s.STORE_NAME, s.OWNER_NAME, s.STORE_PHONE, s.FOOD_CATEGORY, s.BUSINESS_HOUR, s.STORE_COMMENT, s.DESCRIPTION, a.ROAD_ADDRESS, a.JIBUN_ADDRESS FROM BUSINESS_REQUEST b INNER JOIN STORE s ON s.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID INNER JOIN STORE_ADDRESS a ON a.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID WHERE b.BUSINESS_REQUEST_ID = #{businessRequestId}

SELECT b.BUSINESS_REQUEST_ID, b.STORE_ID, b.BUSINESS_REQUEST_REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, s.STORE_NAME, s.OWNER_NAME, s.STORE_PHONE, s.FOOD_CATEGORY, s.BUSINESS_HOUR, s.STORE_COMMENT, s.DESCRIPTION, a.ROAD_ADDRESS, a.JIBUN_ADDRESS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BUSINESS_REQUEST_ID DESC) AS RN, BUSINESS_REQUEST.* FROM BUSINESS_REQUEST ) b INNER JOIN STORE s ON s.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID INNER JOIN STORE_ADDRESS a ON a.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID WHERE b.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY BUSINESS_REQUEST_ID DESC
SELECT NVL( (SELECT BUSINESS_REQUEST_ID FROM BUSINESS_REQUEST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}), 0 ) AS ID FROM DUAL
